name: 48 Hours Of Cheeseposting
description:
Description

48 Hours of Cheeseposting is a compilation of microgames, all needing to be completed in less than five seconds. The plot follows Kawwa as he tries to rescue his brother Teedus after the TV trapped him inside. A total of 8 microgames exist, distributed into 16 rounds or "channels" you must complete in order to complete your mission and reunite with your lil' brother.

Other Info/Comments

As this might be our final Game Jam together, we have decided not to limit ourselves and place as many memes into the game as possible.

Controls

For specific control details read the description of the microgame before your turn.

Intro (Cinematics)/Flinstones?!

Space bar

Guy Fieri's Tentacles/Peppa Finger/Tuna Up!/Tinder in a GGJ Game?

Arrow/directional keys

Dress Me Up, Meg.../Open Source Duck Hunt/Crazy Bus

Mouse Pointer/Click
